page.title: 17LUTON TOWN FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content:
"The Hatters" are in Division 1 of The Canon League and 1985 is their centenary year.Former player David Pleat has been manager for 7 years.
Their ground is in Bury Park,an older residential district of S.E.Luton, and there is no room for expansion.A plan to move to a specially built covered stadium in Milton Keynes led to a great deal of argument.Now the club plan to replace their grass pitch with an artificial surface and seem certain to stay at Kenilworth Road.
Violence and vandalism by football supporters have not passed Luton by.In 1985 a match against Millwall was held up when fans invaded the pitch.Some people living near the ground had their windows smashed.
